text: Ishita Ganguly is an Indian television actress. ==Career== Ganguly's first television series was Colors TV's 2014 drama Shastri Sisters in which she portrayed Anushka Shastri opposite Vijayendra Kumeria. In 2015, she made a cameo appearance in Star Plus's Tu Mera Hero and played an episodic role in &TV;'s horror series Darr Sabko Lagta Hai. In 2016, Ganguly played Kamini Nehra in Colors TV's Ishq Ka Rang Safed opposite Mishal Raheja and Navya in episodic show Yeh Hai Aashiqui. She next took on the roles of Kashibai in Peshwa Bajirao for which she prepared horse riding and Rajkumari Amrusha in Prithvi Vallabh - Itihaas Bhi, Rahasya Bhi. Also in 2018, she portrayed Nitya in Laal Ishq and Chandralekha/Raisa Rastogi in Kaun Hai?. Her next roles were in Vikram Betaal Ki Rahasya Gatha, Shrimad Bhagwat Mahapuran and Jag Janani Maa Vaishno Devi - Kahani Mata Rani Ki. ==Television== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Show !
